H0.text: What does an octopus spray when threatened. Water

H1.text: What does an octopus spray when threatened. Venom

H2.text: What does an octopus spray when threatened. Mucus

H3.text: What does an octopus spray when threatened. Ink

A4.text: Octopuses have an ink sac that can be used to expel a cloud of dark ink to confuse predators.

A5.text: The ejected cloud of melanin is usually mixed, upon expulsion, with mucus, produced elsewhere in the mantle, and therefore forms a thick cloud, resulting in visual (and possibly chemosensory) impairment of the predator, like a smokescreen.
